alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 11:09PM CDT until June 10 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rooks County in north central Kansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1108 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Lenora to near Nicodemus to near Zurich, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Zurich around 1115 PM CDT. Damar around 1120 PM CDT. Plainville around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Webster State Park, Codell and Stockton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
